org.openimaj.math.geometry.point

Interface Point2d

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Coordinate, Readable, ReadableASCII, ReadableBinary, ReadWriteable, Writeable, WriteableASCII, WriteableBinary
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ScaleSpacePoint
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPoint2d, AffineInterestPointKeypoint, AffineSimulationKeypoint, AffineSimulationKeypoint.AffineSimulationKeypointLocation, ByteDSIFTKeypoint, CircularInterestPointKeypoint, DoublePoint2dImpl, EllipticInterestPointData, Feature, FloatDSIFTKeypoint, FloatKeypoint, FValuePixel, GenericValuePixel, InterestPointData, InterestPointKeypoint, IntValuePixel, Keypoint, KeypointLocation, MinMaxKeypoint, MinMaxKeypoint.MinMaxKeypointLocation, Pixel, Point2dImpl, QuantisedKeypoint, ScaleSpaceLocation, SIFTGeoKeypoint.SIFTGeoLocation, SpatialLocation, ValuePixel

    public interface Point2d
extends Coordinate
    Interface representing a point in 2d space with x and y coordinates. This interface allows single precision floating point ordinates, however, the actual backing type can be of any precision, and actual values can be accessed through the Coordinate interface.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
